mapper.sql: TERMINAL_ID, TERMINAL_NAME, TERMINAL_TYPE, ERP_CODE, AGENT_ID, STATION_CODE, OFFICE_CODE, ZONE_CODE, CHANNEL_ID, HIERARCHY_ID, TERMINAL_STATUS, PLAN_DATE, JOIN_DATE, CREATE_DATE, TERMINAL_ADDRESS, TERMINAL_DISTRICT, TERMINAL_CITY, TERMINAL_PROVINCE, PRODUCT_CATEGORY_IDS, IS_DELETE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from user_terminal
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into user_terminal (TERMINAL_ID, TERMINAL_NAME, TERMINAL_TYPE, ERP_CODE, AGENT_ID, STATION_CODE, OFFICE_CODE, ZONE_CODE, CHANNEL_ID, HIERARCHY_ID, TERMINAL_STATUS, PLAN_DATE, JOIN_DATE, CREATE_DATE, TERMINAL_ADDRESS, TERMINAL_DISTRICT, TERMINAL_CITY, TERMINAL_PROVINCE, PRODUCT_CATEGORY_IDS, IS_DELETE) values (#{terminalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{terminalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{terminalType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{erpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{officeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zoneCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hierarchyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{terminalStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{planDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{joinDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{terminalAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{terminalDistrict,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{terminalCity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{terminalProvince,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productCategoryIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT})

TERMINAL_ID,

mapper.update:
update user_terminal
TERMINAL_ID = #{record.terminalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TERMINAL_NAME = #{record.terminalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TERMINAL_TYPE = #{record.terminalType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ERP_CODE = #{record.erpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_ID = #{record.agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATION_CODE = #{record.stationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OFFICE_CODE = #{record.officeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZONE_CODE = #{record.zoneCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNEL_ID = #{record.channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HIERARCHY_ID = #{record.hierarchyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TERMINAL_STATUS = #{record.terminalStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
PLAN_DATE = #{record.planDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
JOIN_DATE = #{record.joinDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_DATE = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

TERMINAL_DISTRICT = #{record.terminalDistrict,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TERMINAL_CITY = #{record.terminalCity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TERMINAL_PROVINCE = #{record.terminalProvince,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PRODUCT_CATEGORY_IDS = #{record.productCategoryIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DELETE = #{record.isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},

update user_terminal set TERMINAL_ID = #{record.terminalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TERMINAL_NAME = #{record.terminalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TERMINAL_TYPE = #{record.terminalType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ERP_CODE = #{record.erpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT_ID = #{record.agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATION_CODE = #{record.stationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OFFICE_CODE = #{record.officeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZONE_CODE = #{record.zoneCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_ID = #{record.channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HIERARCHY_ID = #{record.hierarchyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TERMINAL_STATUS = #{record.terminalStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, PLAN_DATE = #{record.planDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, JOIN_DATE = #{record.joinDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_DATE = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TERMINAL_ADDRESS = #{record.terminalAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TERMINAL_DISTRICT = #{record.terminalDistrict,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TERMINAL_CITY = #{record.terminalCity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TERMINAL_PROVINCE = #{record.terminalProvince,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRODUCT_CATEGORY_IDS = #{record.productCategoryIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DELETE = #{record.isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT}

TERMINAL_NAME = #{terminalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
